code: import React,{useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{Link,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import"../styles/reg.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Register=()=>{const[formData,setFormData]=useState({username:"",password:"",height:"",weight:"",age:"",gender:""});const navigate=useNavigate();const handleChange=e=>{setFormData({...formData,[e.target.name]:e.target.value});};const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{await axios.post("http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/register/",formData);window.showErrorPopup("Успешная регистрация!");navigate("/login");}catch(err){console.error(err);window.showErrorPopup("Ошибка регистрации!");return;}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Lroot",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"Lleft_box",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/contact",className:"Lbutton_back",children:"\u2B05\uFE0F Back"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Lcenter_box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"Lbig_login",children:"Register"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"Rcenter_box_child",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"Rcenter_inbox",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"Lform",onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[["username","password","height","weight","age","gender"].map(field=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"Rlogin_text",children:field.charAt(0).toUpperCase()+field.slice(1)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:field,placeholder:`Enter ${field}`,className:"Linput",type:field==="password"?"password":"text",value:formData[field],onChange:handleChange})]},field)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"Lenter_button",children:"\u27A1\uFE0F Register"})]})})})]})]});};export default Register;
